project.title: Encounter with the Black Diaspora in Greece - the AfroGreeks
project.description: In this project, I put together materials from the archive of the collective community project the AfroGreeks, in order to articulate the discourse on Blackness and identity currently emerging in Europe, with a primary focus on Greece. ,This project attempts to situate local community experiences within broader conversation on African diasporic cultural expression and belonging, while giving visibility to the experiences of the African diaspora in Greece. The goal is to raise awareness about the critical social issues faced by Black communities outside the U.S., highlighting the specific challenges they confront, their contributions to the evolving scholarship of Black Studies, and the ways digital humanities methodologies can illuminate these narratives and advance the field.
project.creator: Grace-137
